name: RQG_NAME_HISTORY
description: This table contains Name History Information for the Requisition Grouper (RQG) source.

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: This is the primary key for RQG tables and refers to the ID number of the Requisition Grouper source.

columns.name: RQG_NAME_HX_LINE
columns.description: The Line Count of Name entries.

columns.name: RQG_NAME_HX
columns.description: Stores the history of the Requsition Grouper (RQG) source name.

columns.name: RQG_NAME_HX_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date of change associated with the Requsition Grouper (RQG) source name.
